name: Crazy Motorbike Stunts: Extreme Sky Ride
name_original: Crazy Motorbike Stunts: Extreme Sky Ride
description:
Crazy Motorbike Stunts: Extreme Sky Ride racing is one of the best Moto GP stunt racing game with one of the difficult stunt arenas on high above the road and city skyscraper buildings. Bike stunt is a racing and sports game in which bike riders performs extreme bike stunt with thrilling mission high above the sky. The Crazy Motorbike Stunts: Extreme Sky Ride game is unique for xtreme sports bikers daring to challenge the impossible stunts! Bike stunt mania is all about bike balance, skill, control and showing unique stunts as you guide your rider across the ramps, jumps, barrels and obstacles above the city skies. Failing to do have fatal consciences!

Try to find the right balance between power and grip while staying in your tracks. Filled with killer tricks, extreme freestyle action and insane stunts, Bike racing is a high thrill trial bike riding adventure - it’s the evolution of xtreme sports bike riding stunts!

Crazy Motorbike Stunts: Extreme Sky Ride racing fever has a realistic stunt and real bike physics endless difficult tricky path road track. This game has a real game play. Each level is more challenging and exciting than the other. And perform some daring stunts!

1) Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
2) Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
3) Multiple Dirt Extreme Bikes
4) Unique, sky high, rough and dangerous tracks
5) Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
6) Challenging stunts game-play
